Ontodog website:
http://ontodog.hegroup.org

Only need to set following parameters on the Ontodog website:

Ontodog data input
(1) Provide Ontodog input term file
	Upload the ontoDog_input.xlsx here
(2) Select one source ontology
	Use default one which is OBI

Settings for Ontodog output files
Go to:
Output File 3: Subset of source ontology containing all view terms and related terms/axioms
(1) URI of owl file 
	http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/obib/dev/import_OBI_subset.owl
